text: The Nădrag (in its upper course also: Padeș) is a right tributary of the river Timiș in Romania. It discharges into the Timiș in Jdioara. Its source is in the Poiana Ruscă Mountains. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice - județul Timiș Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Timiș County
title: Nădrag (river)
